text: Itte yaru ga i. `Arra ga shimo peta chi ni atae rareta, kare kara no (tamamono) ya, shokuryo to shite (ataerareta) seijona mono o, dare ga kinjita no ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Korera no mono wa, gense no shinko suru mono-tachi no tame no monodeari, tokuni shinpan no hi ni wa kanzen ni shinja no sen'yu suru mono to naru.' Ware wa kono yo ni shirushi o, rikai aru hitobito ni kaimei suru
